disableWhileTypingCmd.name: disableWhileTypingCmd
disableWhileTypingCmd.name[zh_CN]: 打字时禁用触控板命令
disableWhileTypingCmd.description[zh_CN]: 设置打字时禁用触控板的命令
disableWhileTypingCmd.description: Set the command to disable touchpad hitting while typing

disableWhileTyping.name: disableWhileTyping
disableWhileTyping.description[zh_CN]: 如果您在打字时意外触碰触控板有问题，请设置为TRUE
disableWhileTyping.description: Set this to TRUE if you have problems with accidentally hitting the touchpad while typing

horizScrollEnabled.name: horizScrollEnabled
horizScrollEnabled.description[zh_CN]: 启用触控板水平滚动功能
horizScrollEnabled.description: Set this to TRUE to allow horizontal scrolling by the same method selected with the scroll_method key

vertScrollEnabled.name: vertScrollEnabled
vertScrollEnabled.description[zh_CN]: 启用触控板垂直滚动功能
vertScrollEnabled.description: Set this to TRUE to allow virtical scrolling by the same method selected with the scroll_method key

tapToClick.name: tapToClick
tapToClick.description[zh_CN]: 启用触控板轻触点击功能
tapToClick.description: Set this to TRUE to be able to send mouse clicks by tapping on the touchpad

touchpadEnabled.name: touchpadEnabled
touchpadEnabled.description: Set this to TRUE to enable all touchpads

leftHanded.name: leftHanded
leftHanded.description[zh_CN]: 为左手用户交换触控板左右键
leftHanded.description: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice with 'left', 'right' for right-handed, 'mouse' to follow the mouse setting

motionAcceleration.name: motionAcceleration
motionAcceleration.description[zh_CN]: 触控板移动加速倍数，-1为系统默认值
motionAcceleration.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default

motionThreshold.name: motionThreshold
motionThreshold.description[zh_CN]: 激活触控板加速前指针必须移动的距离（像素），-1为系统默认值
motionThreshold.description: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default

motionScaling.name: motionScaling
motionScaling.description[zh_CN]: 触控板移动速度倍数，-1为系统默认值
motionScaling.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default

naturalScroll.name: naturalScroll
naturalScroll.description[zh_CN]: 启用触控板自然（反向）滚动
naturalScroll.description: Set this to TRUE to enable natural (reverse) scrolling for touchpads

doubleClick.name: doubleClick
doubleClick.description[zh_CN]: 触控板双击时间间隔（毫秒）
doubleClick.description: Length of a double click in milliseconds

dragThreshold.name: dragThreshold
dragThreshold.description: Distance before a drag is started

palmDetect.name: palmDetect
palmDetect.description[zh_CN]: 设置为TRUE以启用触控板手掌检测
palmDetect.description: Set this to TRUE to enable touchpad palm detect

palmMinWidth.name: palmMinWidth
palmMinWidth.description: The min width for palm detect

palmMinPressure.name: palmMinPressure
palmMinPressure.description: The min pressure for palm detect
